Package hxasjc.utilstuff.util

Class CharacterMatcher

java.lang.Object
hxasjc.utilstuff.util.CharacterMatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Predicate<Character>
public class CharacterMatcher extends Object implements Predicate<Character>
Defines sets of Characters that can be used for a variety of functions that include matching characters

    • getCharacterMatcherWith

      @Deprecated public static CharacterMatcher getCharacterMatcherWith(Character character)
      Deprecated.
      Returns a new CharacterMatcher containing only the given character. Use getCharacterMatcherWithAnyOf(Character...) instead.
